Berkeley.Haas School of Business:
The Walter A. Haas School of Business, also known as the Haas School of Business or Berkeley Haas, is one of 14 schools and colleges at the University of California, Berkeley.
The mission of Berkeley Haas is to develop leaders who redefine how we do business. The school's culture is centered around the Berkeley Haas Defining Leadership Principles:
Question the Status Quo
Confidence Without Attitude
Students Always
Beyond Yourself
The school is housed in four buildings surrounding a central courtyard on the southeastern corner of the UC Berkeley campus.
